long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Auto Refresher is a convenient Chrome extension that automatically refreshes selected browser tabs at user-defined intervals. Easily manage which tabs to refresh and set custom intervals to keep your content up-to-date. Perfect for monitoring live data, social media updates, or any webpage that requires regular refreshes.
